snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500 rose 1.3 percent as a wild week ended with a handful of strong corporate results and some encouraging economic news.
abstract: Stock market caps turbulent week with big gain, sign of rebounding investor confidence after days of gloomy economic news.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500 rose 1.3 percent as a wild week ended with a handful of strong corporate results and some encouraging economic news.

headline.main: Market’s Up-and-Down Week Ends on a High Note
headline.print_headline: Market Ends Volatile Week on a High Note
